post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Since oracle took over SUN, I have noticed that  all Java resources I could see at Sun site were moved to Oracle Site.
Here is URL for Java/J2EE developers:
http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/

J2EE6.0 Tutorial PDF:
http://download.oracle.com/javaee/6/tutorial/doc/javaeetutorial6.pdf
post.title: For Java/J2EE developers
